As of 2021 with SBMM, the changes made by the developers are very bad in regards to what the entirety of the community really wants. It's not that people want easy games, or people want to slug and get an easy 4k every game (although for some, that is the reason because let's face it, there are quite a few killers out there that are not that great at the game), but it's because people don't want to get completely sweated on at the top tier of gameplay every single game. Survivors take lots of advantages when it comes to gen rushing and looping even the best killers so much that all gens can easily be done in ~4 minutes. Also, with an RNG aspect involved, it sure as hell cannot be considered a competitive game, on top of some of the bugs this game has as well.

The game in it's casual form is the best. Killers just memeing and having fun with survivors or survivors just running around doing funny dumb things that make the game more of a fun environment. Now, to say though, that's not all I want from this game. What I want from this game is a fun environment, whether killers/survivors take it seriously or not, you can always go again next game, even if you get stomped a few times. You can do the same when it comes to SBMM as well, but, what SBMM basically did, was add longer queue times for certain players.

For killer games, it takes me around 10-15 minutes on average to find a game at peak hours. For survivor on the other hand, I get in within like a minute (probably because I main killer). The old ranking system wasn't perfect by any means, but games were way more fun and queue times were fine, at least for me.

Final note, this game has become my favorite before SBMM, and the game overall is a really fun and addicting game, especially the way progression works in this game. If the developers pick themselves up and fix the game the way a majority of the player base wants it, this can be one of the best multiplayer asymmetrical games out there.

Если говорить честно то эта игра ну уж слишком стала говёной так как раньше это была супер ламповая игра а сейчас помойка которая катится ко дну так как никто в неё толком из новых игроков не играет а старых удержать уже не может. Для меня это 2 года моей жизни из которой я вынес для себя много уроков а так же я встретился с хорошими людьми и даже с некоторыми встретился в реальной жизни! Эта игра сожет сплотить кампанию а так же её и разрушить.Игра топ но вот дело в том что это больше про игру с друзьями на долгое время а не просто зашёл вышел забросил.
P.S я хз кто это прочтёт да и мне пох я лишь хочу сказать что у игры так себе разрабы но вот сама она клёвая и благодаря ней я завёл друзей.

Самая кооперативная игра из всех

[b] 1. 비대칭형 술래잡기라 아무리 불균형이 존재할 수 밖에 없지만, 개발팀은 아예 밸런스 맞출 생각이 없음.[/b]

직쏘 살인마인 피그는 원래 성능 개쓰레기였는데, 엔드게임 패치할 때 너무 사기가 될 것 같자 임시방편이라고 너프를 때리고, 그러면서도 당연한듯이 상향점은 아무것도 없었음. 얘네 패치 주기와 로드맵 발표한거 보면 걍 내년까지 관에 쳐박혀 있으라는 듯.

게다가 악명높은 너스는 패치 자체를 안함. 물론 상위권과 하위권을의 밸런스 불균형을 동시에 밸런스 패치를 할 순 없지만, 최소한의 대책이라도 내놔야 할 것을 안함. 덕분에 너스만 자주 보이고 다른 살인마는 잘 안씀.

게다가 살인마 퍽중 패널티는 없고 생존자한테 손해만 유발하는 파멸퍽은 없으면 상위권에서 진행 자체가 안되는 수준. 그런데 밸런스는 아무것도 안건드리는 바람에 파멸퍽은 필수퍽이 됨.

생존자 퍽 중에서도 칼찌/패기/시계라는 개사기 퍽들 덕분에, 살인마가 개호구로 보일 정도로 엄청나게 시간을 끌 수 있음.



[b] 2. 랜뽑은 패널티가 아예 없음. 멀티에서 이딴겜 첨봄. [/b] 

 그나마 주는 이탈점수도 존나 쥐꼬리만큼이라 의미없음.
(19/06/02 기준. 로드맵 발표에서 해당 부분 패치 있을 것이라고 발표)



[b] 3. 전승기술 시스템 때문에 살인마는 걍 능력만 다르지 퍽은 다 똑같은거 들고옴. [/b] 

심지어 생존자는 아예 전승퍽만 들고 뛰는 놈들이라 사실상 캐릭터별 차별점은 아예 없고 스킨 수준임.

그래서 살인마는 당해보기 전까진 절대 생존자의 퍽을 예상못함.
이러한 캐릭터간 캐성을 아예 없애버리는 부분은 굉장히 마이너스임.




[b] 4. 매칭/랭크 시스템 자체가 개판임. [/b] 

300핑은 심심하면 잡히고, 다인큐인지 확인할 방법은 프로필들어가서 보는 것 외엔 아예 없음. 

랭크 구분은 아예 의미가 없을 정도로 매칭은 아무나 막 잡음. 
게다가 랭크 자체가 동기가 생길만한 구석 자체도 없음(랭크는 매월 13일에 초기화 되지만,  보상은 아예 없음).
그나마 15랭 이하까진 초기화할때 안내려간다지만, 어차피 의미없는게 매칭을 대충 잡아서 서로 만나게 되어있음.



[b] 5. 비밀의 신전에서 고의적으로 특정 퍽을 안품 [/b] 

그나마 위의 전승퍽이나 뉴비 유입 진입장벽, 블포 노가다 문제를 해결하려면, 비밀의 신전에서 많이 채용되는 퍽들인 전력질주나, 파멸퍽 등을 자주 풀어야 하는데, 정반대로 거의 풀지 않고, 꼬우면 DLC사라는 배째라는 식으로 나오고 있음.

물론 장사하는 입장에선 그럴 수도 있지만, 근본적으로 게임에 문제가 있는데 이를 해결할 생각은 안하고 근시안적으로만 생각하는 것 같음.



 이러한 이유때문에, 이 게임은 여러 호러 무비 스타 캐릭터 콜라보와, 게임/그래픽 디자인상 게임 내내 끊임없이 주는 긴장감과 그로 인한 스릴, 전승퍽의 긍정적인 면인 하나의 캐릭터로 여러 전략을 사용 할 수 있는 등 장점도 많지만,
 비대칭형 게임 디자인 중에서도 개발자의 무뇌 발언과 그에 따른 게임 운영, 그리고 고인물과 대표되는 악순환되는 유저 유입, 굉장히 불쾌한 경험을 주는 인성질과 랜뽑 등 멀티 게임에서도 독보적으로 스트레스를 많이 준다.


물론 이런류 게임 좋아하면 충분히 즐길 수 있는게 맞고, 현재 나도 그렇지만, 친구중에 이 게임 추천해주는 새끼가 있으면 손절해야한다. 게임의 실상을 알면 좆같아서 안할거임. 내 친구들한테도 절대 하지말라고 할거임.

Nothing beats being home in the dark with Jason lurking behind every bend, really fun with a group of friends. Plenty of thrills and the concept of the game in actually pretty good, escape if you can!

When I first thought whether to buy this game or Friday the 13th I thought the concept behind Dead by Daylight was kind of stupid... and we could say it is. But the gameplay, the atmosphere and the whole experience is much, much better than that of Friday the 13th. This is a game everyone who can handle this genre should have in their Steam Library. Beware of the incredibly toxic community and the unbalanced perks the developers don't seem to give a shit about though.

Los creadores de este juego tienen un don para hacer todo mal. Lo unico bueno del juego es la idea, pero la verdad todo lo demas un desastre: asesinos muy desbalanceados (unos son demasiado buenos y los otros inutiles), insentiva al asesino a campear lo que hace un juego aburrido para los survivor, si no estas en premade es muy complicado ganar ya que los asesinos suelen campear o tunelear, bugs y errores por todos lados, LA PARTIDA LA HOSTEA EL ASESINO (esto es absurdo para un juego de esta epoca), la comunidad es casi tan toxica como la de lol, las actualizaciones son pesimas porque no modifican a los personajes. Y asi podria seguir renglones y renglones pero creo que con esto ya tienen un buen resumen. Ojala consigan gente mas capacitada para mejorar todos los errores, o en su defecto que creen un juego parecido pero sin estos defectos.

Разработчики убили игру своим обновлением. Систему матчмейкинга ухудшили теперь что  бы поиграть за Маньяка надо ждать где то 3 минуты или даже больше. Старые баги не пофиксили. Так же ухудшили систему рангов. Не покупайте эту багованную xyйню не тратьте свое время и деньги, разработчики своим обновлением все испортитили.
Brain Damage
Es uno de mis juegos favoritos, si alguien quiere que le ayude a jugar agrega como amigo  y a jugar!!!

El juego es entretenido con amigos, si jugas solo no esperes ganar a no ser que juegues killer. 
Es un bugfest fuerte, no hay partida en la que no haya algo bugeado, si es que la hay, actualmente hay un bug que pasa muy seguido que a alguno de los 5 se le crashea mientras carga, esto provoca que todos los demas estén en una pantalla de carga infinita hasta que esa persona que esta bugeada cierre el juego, y empieza la partida con 1 menos, resulta muy aburrido jugar 1vs3.
Mas de 2 años para anunciar servidores dedicados.
Llegar a rangos altos es inutil ya que tocan siempre lo mismos killers, tanto personajes como personas, ya sabes hasta como juegan y sus perks despues de unas partidas, es aburridisimo, ademas de que no hay ningun reward por llegar a rango alto mas que los logros de steam.
El juego lo recomiendo si vas a jugar con amigos, es divertido, y si no lo jugas mucho o no sos tan tryhard te va a gustar mas todavía, la idea es buena, pero si lo hiciera una empresa que cruce 2 neuronas le pasa el trapo.
游戏画面不错，游戏性也很有趣，4v1的模式很新颖！活动也很多！值得入手

11/2019, Se va arreglando el juego, haber aun tiene algunos bugs, pero no son tan odioso como antes y lo de la esperar para jugar, haber sigue tardando pero no tanto como antes, haber si esto de los servicios dedicados vaya mas mejor.

05/2019, he vuelto a jugar, veo menos bugs pero  "Los servidores van muy mal" Lags a saco y eso que sin contar con los que se desconectan, sobretodo a principio de partida, llevo 30 min intentando jugar y no puedo, todo por culpa de que alguno se desconecta en mitad de carga en la partida y si te pasa ya 3 veces seguidas el juego se bugea y se queda en modo carga durante mas de 5 min, obligandote a salir y perdiendo ofrendas y objetos. Aveces me siento tonto jugando a este juego que solo me hace perder mi tiempo para jugar a algo.

02/2019 Llevo un tiempo jugando el juego, al principio me gustaba, la temática y la forma de jugar era divertido, pero ahora tiene muchos Bugs, las partidas son injustas y el Lag, uoooohhh por dios, los servers dan mucha pena, lo siento pero desinstalo el juego un tiempo este juego hasta que reparen los Bugs, lastima me estaba gustando pero creo que he soportado demasiado y ya me he censado del juego por culpa del Lag de los servers y los Bugs.

Me parecía un excelente juego hasta hace un tiempo.
En un par de meses ha dado una vuelta tremendamente asquerosa en lo que es jugabilidad.
Cada vez siento más que pierde la gracia jugar, ya no es un juego atractivo como lo fue hace un tiempo.
Jugas de killer, te rushean asquerosamente, una partida que dure 5 minutos donde el killer no ve a nadie. ¿Les parece divertido jugar a reparar e irse?
Y por la parte de survivor, yo de mi parte suelo reparar 1 generador y luego ir a entretenerme con el asesino. Antes no había problema, el killer se alejaba del gancho, no tuneleaban tanto, no eran tan asquerosos. Sin embargo ahora, además con los putos servidores asquerosos, te pegan hits totalmente falsos, te campean todas las putas partidas, y te tunelean sin asco.
¿Por qué pasa esto? Porque en la partida anterior lo habrán rusheado y violado, esas partidas de 5 minutos que mencioné, por lo tanto se vuelve un circulo vicioso, los survivors se vengan rusheando, y los killers campeando y tuneleando. 
En conclusión, no lo recomiendo ahora, me parece un juego demasiado bueno, pero ahora tiene demasiadas cosas que lo hacen horrible.

Я сосал, меня ебали

Невероятно спорная игра. Ужасное комьюнити с очень агрссивными людьми, как в самой игре, так и в пабликах ей посвещенных. Кемперы, туннелеры и другие маны с противными тактиками на каждом шагу. Как и сурвы, постоянно присидающие и щелкающие фонарями.

Помимо всего этого, часто еще и упоминаются баги, которых я, кстати, так и не заметила за все время игры (либо же они были очень не значительными).

Но, опуская все вышесказанное, эта игра подарила мне приятные часы с друзьями. Она хорошо подходит, чтобы затянуться на 2-3 часа, может и больше. Каждая катка- это что-то новое. Более ли менее часто выускаются обновы с новыми персонажами.  Здесь невероятно большое разнообразие всего: тактик, персонажей, перков, карт, нюансов. 

Первые часы этой игры были действительно страшные. После уже редкие, но какие яркие, испуги от этих тихих-хитрых манов, хватающих тебя за задницу. 

Есть некоторые аналоги, но эта игра одна из лучших. Единственный минус, это долгий поиск. Но если вы ищите что-то, что может вас затянуть на долгое время (с друзьями или даже без них), то, думаю, эта игра хорошо подходит. А по скидке, так вообще супер, учитывая, что они проходят постоянно.
Обожаю эту помойку!

Updated Review (posted October 11, 2019):

Okay, I've been playing for nine months and that is about the time it takes to create a full baby in your uterus. This is wild. This game is absolutely the best. You hear all that talk about a rude/unpleasant community? It doesn't really bother me because I play games to relax. I'm still not competitive and it's just fun to run around and be silly. I like laughing at myself more than pissing over something small. 

Super fun game, once you get the hang of the mechanics it's really easy to play. Not so easy to escape the killer in each game, but that's the thrill of it!

Highly recommend purchasing Michael Myers as a killer. He is fun to play once you get the hang of it.

Original Review (posted Feb 24, 2019):

Absolutely love this game. Have been playing for a couple of weeks and it's not getting old for me yet. One thing I do not like so far is that sometimes the loading screen while waiting to join a game freezes and just keeps ... loading. So I have to End Task and then start the game over. My laptop runs pretty quickly so it's not like it takes a long time, but it is a bit frustrating at times. 

The game is super fun, though. I am not hella competitive, so I see every game as fun rather than annoying. Every now and then something new happens and scares the bejeezus out of me. I do not like the Hag. She is creepy af.

TL:DR The game requires a ton of time and practice. Also one of my main complaints is being fixed in summer 2019.

In my short time playing this game, I've come to have this love-hate relationship. The main reasons why I love this game is that it's so much fun surviving with friends. It's also fun to occasionally farm with killers and survivors alike during events. The game has conceptually perfected the 1 vs. X multiplayer horror genre. I love the regular references to horror classics with cosmetics, as well as the original characters themselves when it comes to the killers. When surviving, I love that the game really flourishes when everyone wants to win as a team, rather than go for the hatch every game. When solo surviving, I feel like I can not only work with everyone, but when it all falls through, I can still win by finding the hatch, or outplaying the killer.

Summary of pros:
- Fun with friends
- Original characters are neat
- Great 1 vs. X multiplayer Horror
- Don't need to win as a team
- Overall friendly community during events

That said, there is a lot that does keep me from enjoying the game to it's fullest. While there's a ton of nice players in the community, I've had an equal amount of run-ins with the most diarrhetic shits this game could offer. This isn't far off from other online games, but whenever I run into them, it's at the worst of times. They fixed this, but I also had a big problem with D-strike in the game. It just sucked when you're about to 4-man, and your obsession strikes you and gets the hatch. Also when others are surviving with friends, one of them would sacrifice themselves in order to spoil the perks to the other three, which makes the game just not as fun. Equally speaking, DC's heavily cripple the game if you're surviving. In my last  spree of matches, I've had at least one every match. This ends me with the final issue, and is the main reason why I've held off dedicating a lot of time into the game. This game is lacking what is so desperately needed; dedicated servers. It's terrible to play a game where you're left having to test ping every lobby. It's even worse when it benefits the killer. I noticed that this game had a couple tournaments as well. If that's the direction Behavior wants to take, they need to implement dedicated servers, or we'd have an issue similar to what happened early on in For Honor's release. I'm happy to know that they will add dedicated servers in the summer of 2019. So the non-intentional DC's, exploits, and loading screen crashes will greatly decrease.

Summary of cons:
- As many toxic players as there are friendly players
- [strike] D-Strike[/strike] fixed February 2019
- Regular DC's and exploits (fixed with Dedicated servers)
- [strike] No dedicated servers [/strike] FIXED SUMMER 2019

Score: [i] 8.5/10 Nea best killer don't @ me.[/i]
